channel.title: lifestyle on Yusuf's Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in lifestyle on Yusuf's Webpage

item.title: Goals for 2024
item.description: Looking back at 2023, it makes me realize how quickly time slips through our fingers. It was a wonderful (yet hectic) year for me. I discovered wealth of information and shared eventful experiences with people. As I stand at the threshold of this new year, I anticipate more promising events and learnings. I dislike making new year resolutions due to the psychological inclination of undertaking drastic changes, so I have committed myself to implement small changes for a lasting impact, some of which are follows:

item.title: 70 Hours per Week
item.description: Old men and their advise. Sometimes I wonder if you should take any of these old men seriously. If you don’t know what I am talking about, Infosys founder Narayana Murthy recently said that young Indians must work 70 hours a week. 70 hours a week. What a phenomenal advice from a capitalist. His argument is, if you want India to realize its economic potential every young Indian must say: “This is my country.
